avalancheActivity.comment: Still low avalanche danger. Dander spots can be located in high altitudes in the expositions north to east and behind ridgelines. There slab avalanches could be triggered in extremly steep slopes by high additional loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: No significant change of the avalanche danger. Caution: snowdrift accumulations in shady areas!

snowpackStructure.comment: In high altitudes small amounts of snowdrift accumulations have formed which partially are on top of faceted snow. The new snow is covering an old snow cover which weakened due to kinetic metamorphosis in high altitudes it is on top of a hard old snow cover.

tendency.highlights: The avalanche danger is not significantly changing. Tuesday will be predominantly sunny. Some clouds are passing through during the day. It will stay cold in high altitudes.

weatherForecast.comment: On Monday persistent high fog with an upper limit of 1.900 m to 2.300 m. In places light snowfall is possible. During the course of the day the high fog is clearing up from northwest and in the western upper Styria it can be sunny. In area from Fischbacher Alps to Koralpe chances of sunny weather are low. Temperatures in 2.000 are around -11 degrees at noon.

customData.generalHeadline: Little amount of new snow - avalanche danger still low!
